video_prompt: A colossal dragon actively breathes fire, its body maneuvering as it hovers above a castle. Flames erupt and spread from its maw. Its large wings flap, demonstrating powerful flight. Mist shifts across the mountainous landscape around the active scene. Flags on the castle ripple.
image_prompt: Dragon breathing fire on castle in misty mountains. Vertical, dark scales, red eyes, sharp horns. Medieval castle, grey stone, teal roofs, blue flags. Epic fantasy.
refined_video_prompt: A dragon's body maneuvers, wings powerfully flapping while it hovers. Flames erupt and expand from its maw. Mist continuously shifts, changing the background's visibility. Castle flags ripple rhythmically.
